structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-164. Change of authorized bus stops.
Whenever an authorized bus stop is changed or created by MDTA, the permittee shall be so notified. In the case of a deletion of an authorized bus stop, the permittee shall have fourteen (14) days to remove the public bench or benches. The permittee may request permission to move said bench or benches to other authorized bus stops within its designated area.
